channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to admit roughly 12,000 refugees
item.description: A judge has ordered the Trump administration to admit some 12,000 refugees into the United States. The court order on Monday partially blocks the president’s efforts to suspend the nation’s refugee admissions program.

item.title: Trump administration asks judge to toss suit restricting access to abortion medication
Boat believed to be carrying migrants capsizes off California coast, leaving 3 dead and 7 missing
